secondary_personas: Content creators managing multiple output channels
Entrepreneurs overwhelmed by project management tools
Business owners wanting to leverage AI without coding
pain_points: Scattered AI sessions with no continuity between conversations
Inconsistent productivity and difficulty maintaining focus
Overwhelmed by complex tools like Notion requiring manual maintenance
No objective measurement of daily productivity
High friction in maintaining discipline and routines
goals: Achieve consistent daily focus on high-impact work
Automate planning to under 2 minutes per day
Maintain strategic alignment across weeks and months
Leverage AI agents for content creation and business operations
Achieve 'mind peace' through complete work traceability
target_audience.usage_context: Daily morning planning sessions, throughout-day task execution, evening productivity assessments, weekly and monthly strategic reviews - all managed through conversational AI interface with Claude Code

product_vision.one_liner: An AI-powered Business Operating System that transforms productivity through intelligent automation, strategic alignment, and frictionless execution
product_vision.problem_statement: Business owners and entrepreneurs waste hours on manual planning, lose context between scattered AI sessions, experience strategic drift from forgotten projects, and struggle to maintain consistent productivity routines using complex tools that require constant manual maintenance
product_vision.value_proposition: Claude Code OS replaces fragmented tools with a unified AI-powered system that automatically tracks work, generates prioritized daily roadmaps in under 1 minute, maintains strategic alignment with your OBG (One Big Obsessional Goal), and provides objective productivity assessments - all through natural conversation with AI agents organized as business departments
success_metrics: Daily planning time reduced from 30+ minutes to under 2 minutes
100% strategic alignment of daily work with OBG
Zero lost projects or forgotten contexts
3-5x execution speed improvement with AI agent teams

existing_features: Executive Office with daily/weekly/monthly planning automation
Operations Department with productivity tracking and scoring (1-10 scale)
AI Growth Engine for strategic advisory and OBG alignment
Content Team with 14+ specialized AI agents (YouTube, Blog, Email, Social)
HR Department with GPT Express agent creation framework
Knowledge Base with 13 core productivity principles
Complete daily workflow with morning planning and evening assessment
Weekly strategic analysis with brutal prioritization framework
Kill Lists for things NOT to do
THE ONE THING daily focus methodology
known_gaps: No automated CLI commands (manual prompt triggers)
No external integrations (calendar, email, project tools)
No mobile/web interface - terminal/Claude Code only
Agent communication relies on manual file-based coordination
technical_debt: Documentation-heavy system requiring regular manual updates
Agent prompts scattered across multiple markdown files
No centralized agent registry or management system
File-based data storage without database backing
No validation or error handling for corrupted state
Manual sync required between planning documents

alternatives: Traditional paper-based productivity systems (GTD, Bullet Journal)
differentiators: True conversational AI interface vs clicking through UIs
AI-powered prioritization based on strategic goals
Zero friction - no manual data entry or maintenance
Objective productivity scoring vs subjective self-assessment
Department-based AI agent organization mimicking real business
Built on 20 years of validated productivity principles
competitive_context.market_position: Premium AI-native productivity system for serious entrepreneurs who want the leverage of AI automation without technical complexity - positioned against both traditional productivity tools (too manual) and raw AI chat (no structure/continuity)

technical: Dependent on Claude AI model capabilities and availability
Local filesystem architecture limits cross-device sync
No offline capability - requires internet for AI features
resources: Appears to be solo developer/maintainer project
dependencies: Claude AI model quality and response time
